snippet: The accelerating wave of partner defections from the law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf threatens to violate loan agreements with its banks to maintain a certain percentage of its partnership.
abstract: The accelerating wave of partner defections from the law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf threatens to violate loan agreements with its banks to maintain a certain percentage of its partnership.

headline.main: Partner Exodus May Upend Dewey's Loans
headline.print_headline: Partner Exodus May Upend Dewey’s Loans
